name: Heist At High Noon
description:
Welcome to the wild west! 
The idea of  hard work for a honest living doesn't look to appealing to you...so your betting it all on a dashing bank robbery!!! 

You get a tip about a vault in a bar...but unfortunately you weren't the only one that heard it...

Shoot your way to survival and a life of riches! After all who doesn't love a  good ‘ol western robbery.

How to Play: 
WASD keys - Move 
Spacebar - Dodge Roll
Left click - Shoot 

Credits:
